cta.body: If you are a career starter or industry insider who wants to take responsibility and keep developing professionally and personally, we would like to hear from you. hero.title: Finanzlau stands for independent financial and business advisory with a strategic focus.
intro: Our office is based in Dusseldorf. From here, we support clients across Germany, either in person or digitally.

Maximilian Fanslau is the owner and responsible point of contact. As an independent financial broker, we are not tied to any bank or insurance company. We represent only our clients’ interests and work across the full financial market to develop tailored, sustainable solutions.

Our approach is based on a holistic perspective. Instead of prioritizing individual products, we design structured concepts that connect wealth building, retirement planning, risk protection, real estate planning, financing, and tax considerations in a coherent way.

profile.title: Maximilian Fanslau
profile.cardBody: Serving clients regionally and across Germany, in person or digitally.

privateClients.title: For Private Clients
paragraphs: We support private clients in building wealth systematically, designing suitable retirement strategies, and protecting relevant risks. Real estate projects, refinancing, and debt restructuring are integrated into the overall strategy and reviewed across the market.
We also analyze existing structures for optimization potential, include tax-efficient planning options, and review public funding programs that can strengthen your financial plan.

businessLeaders.title: For Entrepreneurs and Managing Directors
paragraphs: We advise self-employed professionals, companies, and managing directors on strategic financial decisions and structured business planning. This includes executive pension structures, corporate benefit systems, and the coordination of private and business financial structures.
Investment projects, commercial financing, liquidity planning, and the use of public funding are integrated into the overall concept with an economically sound approach.

aboutPage.closing: Finanzlau stands for independent advice, market overview, and personal responsibility. We work in a structured, discreet, and long-term oriented way and support clients regionally and throughout Germany.
